page.title: 02Edendork
page.content: Edendork is a Townland situated in the hills of East Tyrone between Dungannon and Coalisland and marks the spot where the Cullion and Derryvale Roads converge on the Coalisland Road. Edendork derives its name from the Irish Eaden na dTorc,which means the hill brow of the boars.It consists of- A Catholic Church A Post Office Powerscreen-An Engineering works MRS Mc Canns Grocery shop Edendork Co-op for farming requisites A Co-ed Primary school Edendork Parochial Hall-an exceptional piece of architecture in a rural area. There are 262 pupils,11 teachers,a caretaker,a patrol man and a cook in Edendork Primary School.MR.J.LOGAN is the Principal.
